title: Global ad spending of Mattel from 2013 to 2019
yAxis: Ad expenditure in million U.S. dollars
summary: The Global ad expenditure from U.S. of Mattel was to 750.2 million in 2013 .
This was up from 524.3 million the Year earlier , the highest U.S. in the past six years .
What is the Ad expenditure from U.S. ? Ad expenditure from is essentially the amount of money a bank has on hand in case it needs to cover unexpected expenses from risky transactions .
